Title: Love Affair
Writer: Delmer Daves (screen play), Donald Ogden Stewart (screen play), Mildred Cram (story), Leo McCarey (story)
Actors: Irene Dunne, Charles Boyer, Maria Ouspenskaya, Lee Bowman
Plot: A French playboy and an American former nightclub singer fall in love aboard a ship. They arrange to reunite six months later, after he has had a chance to earn a decent living.
